summary: The document appears to be a confidential internal communication from Deutsche Bank, specifically related to operational risk management. It includes the name of an individual associated with the bank but lacks substantial context or details relevant to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Susan Yau
persons.context: Susan Yau is identified as a Secretary in the Operational Risk Management unit at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

keyFacts: The document is marked as confidential and is intended for internal use only.
It references Deutsche Bank's operational risk management unit.
Susan Yau is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
